title: BF font in existing logo
content:
I've been asked to recreate a logo and I can't place the face...I know the "script" is Caflisch Script Web Pro and I thought the boldface was a Futura or Frutiger, but the G isn't consistent with Futura and the S and C isn't correct with Frutiger, but close. I can tell from the weight at the bottom of the U that it has been manually "scrunched" but need to nail the ID and no one else knows. So, I come to those more knowledgeable than I. Any help would be appreciated.

rick

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418174809im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Montgomery2_6209.jpg)
author: rickruss

comments.content: OK, seems to be Gill Sans Bold, manipulated. Thanks!

You should direct further font id questions to [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418174809/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")  
Don
